title: Help with a Mantle, Ruth ,Maris find

posts.post_title: Help with a Mantle, Ruth ,Maris find
posts.post_content:
I bought a collection about a year ago and these were in the collection. The newest card in the collection was 64 or 65. I can't find any info on this except for a similar button. Is it possible this was a button blank?  I did a black light test and it doesn't light up. The printing is also from the early 60s. Any help would be great.

u may want to put this in the proper section...19th century buy sell is not it!
Sorry. I don't know how it ended up in that section. I must not have been paying attention.
